doc.title: Felonious
doc.plot: Randi "Babyface" Lewis is a former female stick-up kid. After serving a year in prison for a crime she didn't commit she decides to go legit. But a female felon with no work history has a fat chance of living the lavish lifestyle she once led. But everything is about to change for Babyface. While helping a neighborhood friend escape a beating, she stumbles upon the assailants drug stash. Now, with two thugs from D.C. on her trail, Babyface must stay alive long enough to sell the stash and leave the city that seeks retribution for her crimes against it.
